DOC.brief_summary: The propose study seek continue Connect Protect® ( C2P ) community mobilization effort develop coalition plan bring structural change purpose reduce HIV incidence prevalence among youth targeted community nine site .
DOC.detailed_description: Earlier phase C2P outline ATN Protocols 016a , 016b , 040/040b . The C2P community mobilization model entail : determine geographic area population focus coalition prioritize plan action ( accomplish earlier phase C2P ) ; coalition establish shared vision mission ; development strategic plan focus structural change reduce risk associate HIV ; process documentation ; feedback technical assistance coalition . The National Coordinating Center ( NCC ) , operate direction Protocol Chair , provide guidance , training , technical assistance feedback coalition . This protocol continue C2P mobilization effort include enhanced strategic planning activity assist coalition identify necessary relevant structural change . The evaluation C2P include process evaluation ( i.e. , documentation coalition action achievements structural change ; outcome evaluation qualitatively assess ( via Key Informant ( KI ) interview ) C2P effort , include complete structural change , influence risk environment within community . In addition , local health surveillance data HIV test data use evaluate change HIV test pattern HIV/Sexually Transmitted Infection ( STI ) morbidity among youth .
DOC.criteria: 1 . The intervention group = Community member become engaged coalition broad mobilization effort ; 2 . The evaluation group = Key Informants within C2P community either work reside within sector system structural change accomplish and/or coalition focus strategic planning effort .
